翍翍翍

翍字的基本解释

翍
pī
鸟张开羽毛的样子。
古同“披”，散开：“翍桂椒，郁栘杨。”

翍
bì
羽。

翍
pō
飞翔的样子。

翍字的汉语字典释义

[①]［pō］
［《集韻》滂禾切，平戈，滂。］
飞貌。
[②]［pī］
［《廣韻》敷羈切，平支，滂。］
［《集韻》攀糜切，平支，滂。］
“披1”的古字。
(1)披散。
(2)劈开。

翍字的康熙字典解释

【未集中】【羽字部】　翍； 康熙笔画：11； 页码：页956第15
【廣韻】敷羈切【集韻】攀糜切，?音帔。張羽貌。【玉篇】張也。亦作披。【前漢·揚雄傳】翍桂椒而鬱栘楊。【註】翍，古披字。　又【集韻】滂禾切，音頗。飛貌。　又【集韻】平義切，音髲。羽也。

翍字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体韩国明朝体
翍字的起名意思

暂无。

翍
Basic explanation of words
翍
pī
The way the bird spreads its feathers.
Gu Tong "pi", scattered: "Liu Guijiao, Yu Zhiyang."
翍
bì
feather.
翍
pō
The look of flying.
翍
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①] [pō]
["Ji Yun" Ping He cut, Ping Ge, Ping. ]
Flying appearance.
[②]［pī］
["Guangyun" apply cut, flat branch, peng. ]
["Ji Yun" Pan Mi cut, flat branch, peng. ]
The ancient word "Phi 1".
(1) Phi San.
(2) Split.
翍
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Not concentrated] [Father Character Department] 　翍; Kangxi strokes: 11; Page number: page 956 15
[Guang Yun] Fu Ji cut [Ji Yun] Pan Mi cut,? Yin 帔. Zhang Yumei. [Jade articles] Zhang Ye. Also made. [Previous Han·Yang Xiong Biography] Guijiao and Yu Yang. [Note] 翍, the ancient word.　[Jiyun] Panghe cut, sound is quite. Flying appearance.　[Jiyun] Pingyi cut, sound 髲. Yuya.
翍
